mqtt_transport.title: MQTT transport type to use
mqtt_transport.description: TCP - MQTT over TCP, SSL - MQTT over SSL, WS - MQTT over WebSockets, WSS - MQTT over secure WebSockets

mqtt_prefix.title: MQTT topic prefix
mqtt_prefix.description: Full MQTT topic is formed by joining the prefix and Bluetooth-sensor's MAC-address. If 'mqtt_prefix' is empty, then default prefix is used: 'ruuvi/<gateway_MAC_address>/'

mqtt_client_id.title: MQTT client ID
mqtt_client_id.description: If 'mqtt_client_id' is empty, then default client ID is used: '<gateway_MAC_address>'

mqtt_use_ssl_client_cert.title: Enable use of SSL client certificate for authentication on the MQTT server

mqtt_use_ssl_server_cert.title: Enable use of SSL server certificate to authenticate the MQTT server

lan_auth_type.title: Configuring the authentication type when accessing Gateway from LAN
lan_auth_type.description: 'lan_auth_default' - Ruuvi-authentication with username 'Admin' and as a password the Unique ID is used (in format XX:XX:XX:XX:XX:XX:XX:XX) which is printed on the bottom of the Ruuvi Gateway. 'lan_auth_ruuvi' - Ruuvi-authentication, login/password should be specified in 'lan_auth_user' and 'lan_auth_pass'. 'lan_auth_deny' - deny access from LAN. 'lan_auth_allow' - allow access from LAN without a password. 'lan_auth_basic' - HTTP basic authentication, login/password should be specified in 'lan_auth_user' and 'lan_auth_pass'. 'lan_auth_digest' - HTTP digest authentication, login/password should be specified in 'lan_auth_user' and 'lan_auth_pass'.

lan_auth_user.title: Login for authentication when accessing from LAN

lan_auth_pass.title: Password for authentication when accessing from LAN

lan_auth_api_key_use.title: Use API key (token) for HTTP bearer authentication for read-only access from LAN
lan_auth_api_key_use.description: This field is generated when configuration is read via HTTP ('lan_auth_api_key' is not generated in this case)

lan_auth_api_key.title: API key (token) for HTTP bearer authentication for read-only access from LAN
lan_auth_api_key.description: If 'lan_auth_api_key' is empty, then bearer authentication is disabled.

lan_auth_api_key_rw_use.title: Use API key (token) for HTTP bearer authentication for read/write access from LAN
lan_auth_api_key_rw_use.description: This field is generated when configuration is read via HTTP ('lan_auth_api_key_rw' is not generated in this case)

lan_auth_api_key_rw.title: API key (token) for HTTP bearer authentication for read/write access from LAN
lan_auth_api_key_rw.description: If 'lan_auth_api_key_rw' is empty, then bearer authentication is disabled.

auto_update_cycle.title: Configure firmware auto-updating rules.
auto_update_cycle.description: 'regular' - check for updates 1-2 times a day according to the schedule, install new versions only 2 weeks after release. 'beta' - install new versions as soon as a new version is released. 'manual' - do not check for firmware updates and do not install updates automatically

auto_update_weekdays_bitmask.title: Configure firmware auto-updating schedule: specify weekdays
auto_update_weekdays_bitmask.description: Bit-mask for weekdays: bit 0 - Sunday, bit 1 - Monday, ..., bit 6 - Saturday

auto_update_interval_from.title: Configure firmware auto-updating schedule: start time (local timezone)

auto_update_interval_to.title: Configure firmware auto-updating schedule: end time (local timezone)

auto_update_tz_offset_hours.title: Configure firmware auto-updating schedule: local timezone offset (hours)

ntp_server2.title: Address of NTP server 2 (used only if 'ntp_use_dhcp' is false).

ntp_server3.title: Address of NTP server 3 (used only if 'ntp_use_dhcp' is false).

scan_filter_allow_listed.title: Type of Bluetooth sensors filtering
scan_filter_allow_listed.description: If it's true, only the sensors in the list will pass through the filter, other sensors will be filtered out. If it's false, then all sensors will pass through the filter except those in the list.

scan_filter_list.title: List of sensors to filter.
scan_filter_list.description: Type of filtering is set by scan_filter_allow_listed. If scan_filter_list is empty, then filtering is not active
